org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config

类 LockingReliabilityStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.LockingReliabilityStrategy
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ReliabilityStrategy

    public class LockingReliabilityStrategy
extends Object
implements ReliabilityStrategy
    ReliabilityStrategy that uses read/write locks to prevent the LoggerConfig from stopping while it is in use.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      LockingReliabilityStrategy(LoggerConfig loggerConfig)

      • log

        public void log(Supplier<LoggerConfig> reconfigured,
                String loggerName,
                String fqcn,
                Marker marker,
                Level level,
                Message data,
                Throwable t)
        从接口复制的说明: ReliabilityStrategy
        Logs an event.
        指定者:
        log 在接口中 ReliabilityStrategy
        参数:
        reconfigured - supplies the next LoggerConfig if the strategy's LoggerConfig is no longer active
        loggerName - The name of the Logger.
        fqcn - The fully qualified class name of the caller.
        marker - A Marker or null if none is present.
        level - The event Level.
        data - The Message.
        t - A Throwable or null.

      • getActiveLoggerConfig

        public LoggerConfig getActiveLoggerConfig(Supplier<LoggerConfig> next)
        从接口复制的说明: ReliabilityStrategy
        For internal use by the ReliabilityStrategy; returns the LoggerConfig to use.
        指定者:
        getActiveLoggerConfig 在接口中 ReliabilityStrategy
        参数:
        next - supplies the next LoggerConfig if the strategy's LoggerConfig is no longer active
        返回:
        the currently active LoggerConfig
